alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Tarrant (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 01 at 6:58AM CST until March 01 at 7:45AM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Johnson County in north central Texas... Southern Tarrant County in north central Texas... * Until 745 AM CST. * At 658 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Crowley, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is possible. * Locations impacted include... Fort Worth, Arlington, Grand Prairie, Mansfield, Burleson, Benbrook, Crowley, Forest Hill, Kennedale, Everman, Keene, Joshua, Alvarado, Rendon, Venus, Edgecliff Village, Pantego, Cross Timber, Edgecliff and Dalworthington Gardens. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35W between mile markers 27 and 46. Interstate 20 between mile markers 434 and 453. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
